subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 24 points to lead the Oklahoma City Thunder to a 95-82 victory over Fenerbahce Ulker of Turkey in Istanbul, in the first game of the N.B.A. exhibition season.
snippet: Kevin Durant scored 24 points to lead the Oklahoma City Thunder to a 95-82 victory over Fenerbahce Ulker of Turkey in Istanbul, in the first game of the N.B.A. exhibition season.
